com.brunomnsilva.smartgraph.graphview

Interface SmartGraphEdgeBase<E,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - Type stored in the underlying edge
    V - Type of connecting vertex
    All Superinterfaces:
    SmartGraphEdge<E,V>, SmartLabelledNode, SmartStylableNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SmartGraphEdgeCurve, SmartGraphEdgeLine

    public interface SmartGraphEdgeBase<E,V>
extends SmartGraphEdge<E,V>, SmartLabelledNode
    Used as a super-type for all different concrete edge implementations by SmartGraphPanel, e.g., line and curves.
    An edge can have an attached arrow.
    See Also:
    SmartArrow, SmartGraphEdge, SmartLabelledNode, SmartGraphPanel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attachArrow(SmartArrow arrow)
      Attaches a SmartArrow to this edge, binding its position/rotation.
      SmartArrow getAttachedArrow()
      Returns the attached SmartArrow, if any.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.brunomnsilva.smartgraph.graphview.SmartStylableNode

      • attachArrow

        void attachArrow(SmartArrow arrow)
        Attaches a SmartArrow to this edge, binding its position/rotation.

      • getAttachedArrow

        SmartArrow getAttachedArrow()
        Returns the attached SmartArrow, if any.
        Returns:
